properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Uninyunyizie maji, Bwana.
Uninyunyizie maji, Bwana.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Unioshe nitakase, kweli,
Niwe mweupe kabisa. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Mimi ni mwenye dhambi, Bwana,
Mimi ni mwenye dhambi, Bwana,

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Natamani nije kwako, Bwana,
Natamani nije kwako, Bwana.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Naingia nyumba yako, Bwana.
Naingia nyumba yako, Bwana.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Niuone uso wako, Bwana.
Niuone uso wako, Bwana.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Nifurahi milele, Bwana,
Nifurahi milele, Bwana. x2
